item.title: Seeking 10 Freelancers for Product Video Shoot - No Experience Required - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for 10 video creators to shoot videos with our supplement - Magnesium.

You will not need to edit the videos or product images, our team will edit them.

-Gift: You will receive our Supplements.
-You Create: 9:16 ratio, 3-5 minutes in length.
-Budget: $40 for the videos +5 stars for you

Note: Applicants must live in the United States.

We will communicate the specific shooting script via message. Let’s talk!

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:33 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
